casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ed JOYCE. No. 383P98-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Robert Montgomery, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of July 2008 by Defendant for Reversal of Charges:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
